previewArticle.title: Colorado Rapids vs. Sporting Kansas City | MLS Match Preview

recapArticle.title: Colorado Rapids 2, Sporting Kansas City 3 | MLS Match Recap

timelineItems.desc: Colorado Rapids play host to Sporting Kansas City on Saturday afternoon at Dick’s Sporting Goods Park.
timelineItems.title: KICKOFF: Colorado Rapids vs. Sporting Kansas City

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.
Dillon Powers (Colorado Rapids) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Sal Zizzo (Sporting Kansas City).

timelineItems.name: The Rapids Apologist
timelineItems.text: “@RapidsMHC: This game looks like it will be a physical one #COLvSKC” in other news: grass reportedly green.

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Colorado Rapids. Marc Burch tries a through ball, but Deshorn Brown is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: Watts has won a couple early balls in MF- 10 minutes in, but the rookie looks good.

timelineItems.name: Toronto Gooner
timelineItems.text: Mad respect to the away support that #SKC get. Fantastic to see those sort of numbers travelling #COLvSKC

timelineItems.name: Colorado Rapids
timelineItems.text: Jared Watts is looking solid in the MF early on, winning a lot of balls. - @SernaDillon #COLvSKC

timelineItems.name: Larry Tiscornia
timelineItems.text: Just turned on #COLvSKC and what an impressive showing by the #SKC fans at DSG! Over 1k made the treck 2 Denver #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Oriol Rosell (Sporting Kansas City).
Dillon Powers (Colorado Rapids) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Sal Zizzo (Sporting Kansas City) header from the right side of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Graham Zusi with a cross
timelineItems.title: MISS: Sal Zizzo's header drifts wide of frame

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Paulo Nagamura (Sporting Kansas City) left footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Seth Sinovic.
Corner,  Sporting Kansas City. Conceded by John Berner.
Attempt missed. Sal Zizzo (Sporting Kansas City) header from the right side of the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Graham Zusi with a cross following a corner.

timelineItems.desc: Dan Haiek and Armchair Analyst Matt Doyle preview the Saturday match between the Colorado Rapids and Sporting KC. Will a Sporting forward score from the run of play? Is Dillon Powers the best example of a throw back playmaker in MLS? Find out Saturday at 6pm ET on MLS Live.
timelineItems.title: Colorado Rapids vs. Sporting KC March 29, 2014 Preview | The Scouting Report

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Colorado Rapids. Marc Burch tries a through ball, but Dillon Powers is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: 13' Zusi finds Zizzo at the far post on the ensuing corner kick but his header misses the near post 0-0 #COLvSKC

timelineItems.name: Tate Steinlage
timelineItems.text: Nice shot of the #SportingKC away supporters (just short of 1,000). Excellent support as always. http://t.co/DsmF54cpr7

timelineItems.name: Tate Steinlage
timelineItems.text: Nice shot of the #SportingKC away supporters (just short of 1,000). Excellent support as always. http://t.co/DsmF54cpr7

timelineItems.name: Colorado Rapids
timelineItems.text: Defensively, the #Rapids96 look solid. Have to work on holding possession. - @SernaDillon #COLvSKC Still no score 15'

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Ike Opara (Sporting Kansas City) header from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Matt Besler.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Drew Moor (Colorado Rapids) header from the right side of the six yard box is just a bit too high. Assisted by Vicente Sanchez fo
timelineItems.title: MISS: Drew Moor pounces on the corner but heads too high

timelineItems.comment: Edson Buddle (Colorado Rapids) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Paulo Nagamura (Sporting Kansas City).
Attempt missed. Drew Moor (Colorado Rapids) header from the right side of the six yard box is just a bit too high. Assisted by Vicente Sanchez following a set piece situation.
Corner,  Colorado Rapids. Conceded by Ike Opara.
Claudio Bieler (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Jared Watts (Colorado Rapids).
Match ends, Colorado Rapids 2, Sporting Kansas City 3.
Corner,  Sporting Kansas City. Conceded by Deshorn Brown.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt blocked. Nick LaBrocca (Colorado Rapids) right footed shot from very close range is blocked. Assisted by Vicente Sanchez.
timelineItems.title: BIG MISS: Nick LaBrocca is free in front of goal thanks to outstanding play from Vicente Sanchez

timelineItems.name: ThisIsSporting.com
timelineItems.text: Nice ups from Opara on that #SportingKC long throw. Called a foul though, and probably wrongly.

timelineItems.name: Ben Hickey
timelineItems.text: Very open game so far but somehow still 0-0. I'd be surprised if it stays that way much longer. #FRLive #COLvSKC

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Nick LaBrocca (Colorado Rapids) right footed shot from very close range is blocked. Assisted by Vicente Sanchez.

timelineItems.name: Andy Edwards
timelineItems.text: Dillon Powers is reeeeeally damn good, but MY GAWD how did Sanchez not just smash that home?!?! #COLvSKC #SportingKC

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: Sanchez the wizard! LaBrocca misses the sitter of the century…have a feeling that might make ESPN. #COLvSKC

timelineItems.name: ThisIsSporting.com
timelineItems.text: Unmarked and unchallenged chance for Colorado goes begging. Let's clean that up #sportingkc

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: Sanchez a brilliant cut-back, tees it to an open LaBrocca open in front of net with no keeper…and he somehow mis-hits it. Wow! 0-0 23'

timelineItems.comment: Kevin Ellis (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Deshorn Brown (Colorado Rapids).
Foul by Seth Sinovic (Sporting Kansas City).
Vicente Sanchez (Colorado Rapids) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Steve Brisendine
timelineItems.text: So saves off the line are a thing this year in MLS.

timelineItems.name: Andy Edwards
timelineItems.text: BTW, Uri Rosell tripped for, like, 15 consecutive feet on that chance. Really strange. #COLvSKC #SportingKC

timelineItems.name: TNC MLS
timelineItems.text: 22' End to end now in Colorado as a SKC corner results in a strong counter by the Rapids, but SKC ultimately clear their lines #COLvSKC

timelineItems.name: Luke Lohr
timelineItems.text: #COLvSKC continues to impress with great crowds and great moments. 24'

timelineItems.comment: Ike Opara (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Edson Buddle (Colorado Rapids).
Attempt blocked. Benny Feilhaber (Sporting Kansas City) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.

timelineItems.name: Colorado Rapids
timelineItems.text: Possession is getting better. We've had two quality chances to score. - @SernaDillon #COLvSKC

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Sporting Kansas City. Conceded by Marvell Wynne.
Drew Moor (Colorado Rapids) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Matt Besler (Sporting Kansas City).

timelineItems.desc: Foul by Eric Kronberg (Sporting Kansas City).
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Eric Kronberg comes out of his box and tangles with Vicente Sanchez

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Dillon Powers (Colorado Rapids) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Eric Kronberg pounces on a rifle from Dillon Powers

timelineItems.comment: Vicente Sanchez (Colorado Rapids) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Eric Kronberg (Sporting Kansas City).

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: Nobody in #SKC’s lineup today has scored in their first 3 games. Both goals (Collin, Dwyer) on the bench

timelineItems.comment: Hand ball by Claudio Bieler (Sporting Kansas City).

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Alineación de @ColoradoRapids: Berner; O'Neill, Wynne, Moor, Burch; Watts, LaBrocca; Sánchez, Powers, Brown; Buddle. #COLvSKC

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Dillon Powers (Colorado Rapids) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner.

timelineItems.name: Steve Brisendine
timelineItems.text: Well, that was close to being awful for Sporting, but they survive with nothing worse than a yellow to Kronberg to show for it.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Edson Buddle (Colorado Rapids) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Eric Kronberg makes great save from a stunner from Buddle

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: Kronny then comes back with a HUGE save off the ensuing free kick from Powers. 0-0 #COLvSKC

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: Knock. Knock. Knock.

timelineItems.name: Rapids-MileHighClub
timelineItems.text: Rapids getting some great chances, but they NEED to start finishing.... #COLvSKC

timelineItems.name: TNC MLS
timelineItems.text: '29 SKC get very lucky as Kronberg fouls Sanchez but escapes with a yellow. Kronberg also saves the resulting free kick. #COLvSKC

timelineItems.name: Steve Brisendine
timelineItems.text: Kronberg now leads Besler in saves for the match, after denying Buddle.

timelineItems.name: Colorado Rapids
timelineItems.text: Kronberg stops aa shot from Buddle but the #Rapids96 have clearly found some attacking mojo. #COLvSKC 31'

timelineItems.name: Sam McDowell
timelineItems.text: Kronberg with back-to-back brilliant saves to keep this game scoreless. #SportingKC on its heels.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Edson Buddle (Colorado Rapids) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top left corner. Assisted by Jared Watts.

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: Fun half to watch so far. Nothing to show for it, but Mastroeni has to be pleased with #Rapids96 play so far.

timelineItems.name: Andy Edwards
timelineItems.text: Peaks and valleys with Kronberg gonna be reeeeeeally low and reeeeeeally high, methinks. #COLvSKC #SportingKC

timelineItems.name: Steve Brisendine
timelineItems.text: Still wonder what PV thinks of having to do in-match interviews.

timelineItems.name: Nicole Bellizzi
timelineItems.text: The new #SKC announcer Diego used the phrase "penetrating balls". I'm like a 10 yr old and laugh every time! #soimmature

timelineItems.name: Kenny Price
timelineItems.text: Greunebaum will be starting GK at SKC before the year is up. Amazed he isn't already. #COLvSKC

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Paulo Nagamura (Sporting Kansas City) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Corner,  Sporting Kansas City. Conceded by Nick LaBrocca.

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: Won’t go down as a stat anywhere, but that’s a brilliant ball by Powers. Blind, perfect cross-field pass to Brown.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Matt Besler (Sporting Kansas City) header from the centre of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Graham Zusi with a cross following a corner.

timelineItems.name: ThisIsSporting.com
timelineItems.text: Colorado applying all the pressure and getting all the good chances. #sportingkc

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Colorado Rapids. Edson Buddle tries a through ball, but Deshorn Brown is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: David Dir
timelineItems.text: Colorado has looked great on the counter, SKC best chances coming from set pieces. Fun game to watch so far #COLvSKC

timelineItems.comment: Matt Besler (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Dillon Powers (Colorado Rapids).

timelineItems.name: Colorado Rapids
timelineItems.text: So far, doing a great job playing balls into Buddle. Just need to keep doing that. - @SernaDillon #COLvSKC

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Alineación de @SportingKC: Kronberg; Ellis, Opara, Besler (C), Sinovic; Rosell, Nagamura, Feilhaber; Zizzo, Bieler, Zusi. #COLvSKC

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: Peter Vermes having some animated words with Benny Feilhaber - doesn’t look none too happy

timelineItems.comment: Jared Watts (Colorado Rapids) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Claudio Bieler (Sporting Kansas City).

timelineItems.name: Andy Edwards
timelineItems.text: Silly stuff from Drew Moor there. Not really sure what he's hoping to accomplish with that loose flapper. #COLvSKC #SportingKC

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: 41' Bieler shaking off an errant elbow from Moor. #SportingKC setting up for a long throw-in. #COLvSKC

timelineItems.desc: Marvell Wynne (Colorado Rapids) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Marvell Wynne shown yellow for bad foul

timelineItems.name: Steve Brisendine
timelineItems.text: They might not love Seth in Colorado, but the Rapids must love Bieler from all the hugs they're giving him on set pieces.

timelineItems.name: TNC MLS
timelineItems.text: 40' Brief stop in play as Bieler goes down holding his head after getting tangled up with Drew Moor #COLvSKC

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Marvell Wynne (Colorado Rapids).
Sal Zizzo (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Rapids-MileHighClub
timelineItems.text: Brown and Buddle seem to be on different pages...maybe even different books #COLvSKC

timelineItems.name: Ryan Hetu
timelineItems.text: Paulo Nagamura needs to go. Sporting has enough hustle time for some touch and passing ability. #sportingkc

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Nick LaBrocca (Colorado Rapids).
Paulo Nagamura (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Steve Brisendine
timelineItems.text: Need to research reasons for Sinovic hate. Maybe he looks like whoever ruled Girl Scouts can't sell cookies outside pot shops in Colorado.

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Edson Buddle (Colorado Rapids).
Graham Zusi (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: HALF: Good opening 45 from COL. Unlucky not to be up. LaBrocca has to finish that. Most obvious words I’ve tweeted. Great pressure from MF..

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: …Watts more than capable in d-mid role. Rapids have to find a way to score - KC started to find their way a bit towards end of half...

timelineItems.name: Dustin Havens
timelineItems.text: As ever, SKC can apply the high press to others but dont cope with it well when applied to them. Few if any in MLS can. #SKC #COLvSKC

timelineItems.comment: First Half ends, Colorado Rapids 0, Sporting Kansas City 0.

timelineItems.name: Sporting Kansas City
timelineItems.text: Halftime at DSG Park and we'll head into the break scoreless. @Ekronberg with 2 big saves and @mbesler w/ a goal line clearance. #COLvSKC

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: …a solid 45 overall. Might see Torres on here if score holds- probably for Powers, who’s not 100 percent game fit yet. Not much from Brown.

timelineItems.name: Colorado Rapids
timelineItems.text: Neither team could find a goal but the Rapids attack looked very solid in the 1st half. No score. #COLvSKC http://t.co/TSguzNRcEg

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: PT | @ColoradoRapids 0-0 @SportingKC... Solidez ofensiva en los locales, posesión en el medio para la visita. #COLvSKC

timelineItems.name: Andy Edwards
timelineItems.text: GIF: Uri Rosell trips for 15 yards, Vicente Sanchez and Nick LaBrocca blow point-blank chance. #COLvSKC #SportignKC http://t.co/vm6ogNEsMw

timelineItems.name: Steve Brisendine
timelineItems.text: Sporting fortunate not to be down 1-0. Then again, at Sporting Park, lots of visiting teams often fortunate not to be down 1-0 at half.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: John Berner watches a shot sail wide. #COLvSKC is scoreless at HT. http://t.co/32VvMy9lOb

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: John Berner watches a shot sail wide. #COLvSKC is scoreless at HT. http://t.co/32VvMy9lOb

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: #COLvSKC halftime stats w/ #SportingKC listed first: Shots: 6/4 SOG: 1/3 Corners: 4/1 Fouls: 8/9 Possession: 66.5%/33.5%

timelineItems.name: Jonathon Feyerherm
timelineItems.text: At halftime, @Urirosell has completed 33 of 34 passes (97%) and has two interrceptions #COLvSKC

timelineItems.name: Marco Cummings
timelineItems.text: Shots on target more indicative of what first half looked like: 3 for #Rapids96 to 1 for #SKC #COLvsSKC

timelineItems.comment: Second Half begins Colorado Rapids 0, Sporting Kansas City 0.
Foul by Paulo Nagamura (Sporting Kansas City).
Marvell Wynne (Colorado Rapids) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Colorado Rapids
timelineItems.text: Second half underway! Check out a few first half photos: http://t.co/MFcCsRhr2V #COLvSKC

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: The second half has kicked off at DSG Park. Tune in to @38TheSpot for the final 45 minutes! 0-0 #COLvSKC

timelineItems.comment: Delay in match Marc Burch (Colorado Rapids) because of an injury.
Delay in match Paulo Nagamura (Sporting Kansas City) because of an injury.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Foul by Deshorn Brown (Colorado Rapids).
Kevin Ellis (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Rapids-MileHighClub
timelineItems.text: This game looks like it will be a physical one #COLvSKC

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Kronberg & Sanchez tangle. WATCH: http://t.co/fVqCsOZrH0 #COLvSKC

timelineItems.name: Sporting Kansas City
timelineItems.text: 50' GOAL! @gzusi taps home a @SalZizzo to put #SportingKC ahead 1-0!

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: #SKC with the goal! It’s Zusi who finishes after Burch beat by Zisso down right side. 1-0 #SKC 50'

timelineItems.name: Sporting Kansas City
timelineItems.text: 50' GOAL! @gzusi taps home a @SalZizzo cross to put #SportingKC ahead 1-0!

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Colorado Rapids. Shane O'Neill tries a through ball, but Drew Moor is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Colorado Rapids
timelineItems.text: There's your first goal. Zusi from Zizzo. 1-0 SKC. #COLvSKC

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Zusi gives @SportingKC a 1-0 lead in Colorado. A strong start to the 2nd half: http://t.co/BJassGu4KK #COLvSKC

timelineItems.comment: Dillon Powers (Colorado Rapids) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Matt Besler (Sporting Kansas City).

timelineItems.name: Andy Edwards
timelineItems.text: That's what real wing play — a winger who stays wide and runs by defenders — does for this team. Hugely needed dynamic. #COLvSKC #SportingKC

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: GOAL!!! @SalZizzo beats a man down the wing and finds @gzusi alone in the six-yard box to put #SportingKC ahead 1-0 #COLvSKC

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Drew Moor (Colorado Rapids) header from the left side of the six yard box is saved in the top centre of the goal. Assisted by Dillon Powers.

timelineItems.name: David Dir
timelineItems.text: That's why you have to finish, first real KC chance where they get it wide and slotting across #COLvSKC

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Marvell Wynne (Colorado Rapids).
Graham Zusi (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: ¡GOOOL! (40') | Graham Zusi recibe un centro rastrero en el centro del área y empuja la pelota para abrir la cuenta en Denver. #COLvSKC 0-1

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: ¡GOOOL! (50') | Graham Zusi recibe un centro rastrero en el centro del área y empuja la pelota para abrir la cuenta en Denver. #COLvSKC 0-1

timelineItems.name: RoyalsRetro
timelineItems.text: I like this Sal Zizzo guy. Good energy player. Willie Bloomquist-type sparkplug. But with, you know, sports talent. #mls #skc

timelineItems.comment: Dillon Powers (Colorado Rapids) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Benny Feilhaber (Sporting Kansas City).
Corner,  Colorado Rapids. Conceded by Paulo Nagamura.

timelineItems.desc: Penalty conceded by Ike Opara (Sporting Kansas City) with a hand ball in the penalty area.
timelineItems.title: PENALTY: Ike Opara handles the ball in the box

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: 12,203 today.

timelineItems.name: Jim Grundy
timelineItems.text: Sal Zizzo is quickly becoming one of my new favorite players. #SKC

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Colorado Rapids. Conceded by Ike Opara.
Penalty conceded by Ike Opara (Sporting Kansas City) with a hand ball in the penalty area.

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: Sanchez’ll have 50 goals this year at this pace

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: Opara is down and the ref points to the spot.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: This will be @ColoradoRapids' 4th PK of the 2014 season. #COLvSKC

timelineItems.name: Andy Edwards
timelineItems.text: So much for those good Kronberg vibes we had going..... #COLvSKC

timelineItems.comment: Delay in match Ike Opara (Sporting Kansas City) because of an injury.

timelineItems.name: Steve Brisendine
timelineItems.text: Penalty? Not seeing it on early replay looks, but Kronberg shouldn't have spilled in the first place.

timelineItems.name: TNC MLS
timelineItems.text: 56' Corner for the Rapids is easily cleared as it doesn't make it past the man on the post #COLvSKC

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: ANOTHER #Rapids96 penalty!

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  Colorado Rapids 1, Sporting Kansas City 1. Vicente Sanchez (Colorado Rapids) converts the penalty with a left footed shot to the bottom left corner.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Vicente Sanchez powers one from the penalty spot to equalize game

timelineItems.name: Scott Harrington
timelineItems.text: That's an awful penalty call. Opara got studs in his leg causing him to fall on the ball. #COLvSKC #MLS

timelineItems.name: Colorado Rapids
timelineItems.text: Well, looks like we'll have another #Rapids96 PK coming. This will equal the number of PKs drawn in 2013. #COLvSKC

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: Good early pressure up front from #Rapids96

timelineItems.comment: Delay over. They are ready to continue.

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: Sanchez scores (3rd of the season for him). 1-1 60’ #COLvsSKC

timelineItems.name: Matthew Doyle
timelineItems.text: Sporting's got a real gripe on this one, from where I sit. Watts puts his studs into Opara's shin, Opara goes down... PK on KC? No way.

timelineItems.name: Jared Thornburgh
timelineItems.text: Opara tried to put his shin thru the bottom of Watt's boot. Tough luck. That's gonna hurt for a long time. #COLvSKC

timelineItems.name: Seth
timelineItems.text: Weak PK call. Referee is making himself the headline #Rapids96 #SportingKC

timelineItems.name: Colorado Rapids
timelineItems.text: Sanchez steps up to the spot....and....GOAL!!!!!!! Do you expect anything less at this point?! #COLvSKC

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: Kronberg gets a hand on it but Sanchez converts the PK to level this match 1-1 #COLvSKC

timelineItems.name: Matt Terrill
timelineItems.text: No handballs, no fouls, just Opara falling down on top of the ball and grabbing for his inured leg. Absolutely shambolic call. #COLvSKC

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Sal Zizzo (Sporting Kansas City) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the left.
timelineItems.title: MISS: Sal Zizzo's right footer goes wide

timelineItems.name: WeFollowFutbol
timelineItems.text: And regardless, Opara is shaken up on the play. Tough break all around for him. #COLvSKC

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: Kronberg got a hand on it. But just good enough. And Sanchez now has more goals this season than #SKC has as a team.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: ¡GOOOL! (58') | Vicente Sánchez vuelve a anotar su tercer gol de la temporada desde el punto penal y empata el partido. #COLvSKC 1-1

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Sal Zizzo (Sporting Kansas City) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left.
Attempt missed. Aurélien Collin (Sporting Kansas City) right footed shot from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Sal Zizzo.

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: Guess is Sturgis for Watts to push up more

timelineItems.name: Angry Pens Gnome
timelineItems.text: They're gonna have to award a PK to #SportingKC in this game. Can't let the #Rapids bear hug Bieler and then call that handball.

timelineItems.name: Colorado Rapids
timelineItems.text: Burch coming off for Sturgis. Jared Watts moves to LB. Sturgis in MF with Nick LaBrocca. #COLvSKC

timelineItems.comment: Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match Kevin Ellis (Sporting Kansas City) because of an injury.

timelineItems.name: Andy Edwards
timelineItems.text: That's 4 goals scored by the #Rapids this season. All 4 have been penalties. #COLvSKC #SportingKC

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Benny Feilhaber (Sporting Kansas City) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the right from a direct fre
timelineItems.title: MISS: Benny Feilhaber curls his free kick just wide into the side netting

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Nathan Sturgis (Colorado Rapids).
Benny Feilhaber (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Steve Brisendine
timelineItems.text: So far this season, PRO initiative to feed @SimonBorg plenty of material is a rousing success.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Benny Feilhaber (Sporting Kansas City) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the right from a direct free kick.

timelineItems.name: Steve Brisendine
timelineItems.text: Thought that was in for Feilhaber.

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: 68' Feilhaber curls a free kick over the wall that but it sails into the side-netting. #COLvSKC tied 1-1.

timelineItems.comment: Delay in match Deshorn Brown (Colorado Rapids) because of an injury.
Foul by Deshorn Brown (Colorado Rapids).
Benny Feilhaber (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: Watts playing a conservative MF. Just in front of back four- similar positionally to Hendry Thomas last year

timelineItems.comment: Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Corner,  Colorado Rapids. Conceded by Graham Zusi.

timelineItems.desc: Paulo Nagamura (Sporting Kansas City) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Nagamura booked for a shove on Sanchez

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Vicente Sanchez (Colorado Rapids) left footed shot from outside the box misses to the right. Assisted by Dillon Powers following a corner.
Vicente Sanchez (Colorado Rapids) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Paulo Nagamura (Sporting Kansas City).

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: 72 This time Nagamura goes into the referee's book for a yellow card #COLvSKC

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: 71' Sanchez tries to beat Kronberg to the near post but his left-footed strike trickles wide of the target 1-1 #COLvSKC

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Dillon Powers (Colorado Rapids) right footed shot from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Shane O'Neill with a cross.

timelineItems.name: Kristopher McDonald
timelineItems.text: Kronberg has made some great saves today, but he scares the hell out of me way too often. #SKC

timelineItems.name: Brandon Lewis
timelineItems.text: It’s taken me a while to realize that all of the fans I’m hearing are from SKC…why so empty Colorado? #COLvSKC

timelineItems.desc: Penalty Colorado Rapids. Shane O'Neill draws a foul in the penalty area.
timelineItems.title: PENALTY: Shane O'Neill pulled down inside the box

timelineItems.name: Andy Edwards
timelineItems.text: .@JakeYadrich reports from sideline that Ike Opara "shouldn't miss any extended time." Very good news. #COLvSKC #SportingKC

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Colorado Rapids. Conceded by Kevin Ellis.
Penalty Colorado Rapids. Shane O'Neill draws a foul in the penalty area.
Penalty conceded by Benny Feilhaber (Sporting Kansas City) after a foul in the penalty area.

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: ANOTHER PK

timelineItems.name: Andy Edwards
timelineItems.text: FIVE PENALTIES!!!! #COLvSKC #SportingKC

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: Is it possible. Yes

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Make that 5. #COLVSKC

timelineItems.name: Matthew Doyle
timelineItems.text: Colorado's drawn their fifth penalty of the season. Insane.

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: And there's another PK for the Rapids...

timelineItems.name: Luke Lohr
timelineItems.text: #COLvSKC you're just fun. I like you.

timelineItems.name: Andy Edwards
timelineItems.text: The attacking midfielder takes down the center back who just nutmegged him inside the box. #RoleReversal #COLvSKC #SportingKC

timelineItems.name: Matthew Doyle
timelineItems.text: No doubt at all that one's a PK, by the way. O'Neill scorched Feilhaber, then Benny lunged from behind. Easy call.

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  Colorado Rapids 2, Sporting Kansas City 2. Benny Feilhaber (Sporting Kansas City) right footed shot from the center of the box to the bottom left corner.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Benny Feilhaber evens things up moments after Colorado scored

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: Sanchez scores 2-1 78’. Unreal

timelineItems.name: Colorado Rapids
timelineItems.text: GOAL: Sanchez beats Kronberg to put the Rapids up 2-1. #COLvSKC 78'

timelineItems.comment: Lineups are announced and players are warming up.

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: Sanchez converts and the Rapids take a 2-1 lead. #COLvSKC

timelineItems.name: Sporting Kansas City
timelineItems.text: Sanchez converts his second PK of the game and the Rapids lead 2-1 in the 79th minute #COLvSKC

timelineItems.name: WeFollowFutbol
timelineItems.text: The @ColoradoRapids have scored five goals (of five) via the penalty spot this season. Amazing. #COLvSKC

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: HOLY MOLY. Feilhaber equalizes 45 seconds later 2-2 80'

timelineItems.name: Matthew Doyle
timelineItems.text: Turn on Colorado/Sporting, folks. This game is nuts.

timelineItems.name: Andy Edwards
timelineItems.text: What a game. #COLvSKC #SportingKC

timelineItems.comment: Drew Moor (Colorado Rapids) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Paulo Nagamura (Sporting Kansas City).

timelineItems.name: Sporting Kansas City
timelineItems.text: GOAL!!! @b_feilhaber22 smashes home a ball from inside the 6 and we're tied 2-2!!! #COLvSKC

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: GOAL! Zizzo heads a Zusi cross back toward the six-yard box and Feilhaber smashes home the loose ball to level the match 2-2! #COLvSKC

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: ¡GOOOL! (78') | Vicente Sánchez pone arriba a @ColoradoRapids de nuevo de penal. #COLvSKC 2-1

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: . @SportingKC waste no time leveling the match. We're all square at 2-2 in Colorado courtesy of Benny: http://t.co/B1CcZTOXi5 #COLvSKC

timelineItems.name: Sal Cipriano
timelineItems.text: Feilhaber taketh away and then give it! He's in reverse! #COLvSKC

timelineItems.name: TNC MLS
timelineItems.text: 79' GOAL SKC! Instant response from Kansas City as Feilhaber forces the ball in at the near post! #COLvSKC

timelineItems.name: Colorado Rapids
timelineItems.text: Feilhaber pulls one back for #SKC. Tied 2-2 #COLvSKC

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Sporting Kansas City. Sal Zizzo tries a through ball, but Claudio Bieler is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: MRSON_USMNT_MLS
timelineItems.text: You probably should score after you get nutmegged by a defender. #COLvSKC

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: ¡GOOOL! (79') | Gran respuesta de @SportingKC que encuentra el empate con Benny Feilhaber un minuto después. #COLvSKC 2-2

timelineItems.name: David Dir
timelineItems.text: First 5 minutes of concentration so important after a goal , that hurt but still lots of time #COLvSKC

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: Torrees, Dwyer on. Torres for Buddle

timelineItems.comment: Delay in match Paulo Nagamura (Sporting Kansas City) because of an injury.

timelineItems.name: Jeremy Brooks
timelineItems.text: And as soon as I post that, we level the scoreboard. No PK goals needed for us... as @KCCauldron just said, we score REAL goals. #sportingkc

timelineItems.name: Martha
timelineItems.text: Colorado Rapids have yet to score a goal that wasn't a PK this season. Bad habit. #COLvSKC

timelineItems.comment: Delay over. They are ready to continue.

timelineItems.name: Shawn Quesnell
timelineItems.text: .@Johnny's "@SportingKC: A beautiful day in Commerce City. Where is everyone watching #COLvSKC? http://t.co/hI4P9lfwjX"

timelineItems.text: .@Johnny's "@SportingKC: A beautiful day in Commerce City. Where is everyone watching #COLvSKC? http://t.co/hI4P9lfwjX"

timelineItems.text: Check out Altitude Tickets new signage at Dick's Sporting Goods Park as the #Rapids take on Kansas City today at 4! Tickets still available! Go to altitudetickets.com or visit a Dick's Sporting Goods Kiosk! Go Rapids!

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: Final sub for #SportingKC as @Ddwyer14 comes on for @TacaBielerSKC in the 83rd minute.#COLvSKC is tied 2-2.

timelineItems.desc: Second yellow card to Marvell Wynne (Colorado Rapids) for a bad foul.
timelineItems.title: RED CARD: Marvell Wynne slides in late on Graham Zusi

timelineItems.name: Phil Goldfarb
timelineItems.text: Should be a good finish in this #COLVSKC match...thrilled I set Sanchez with captain status today on the fantasy squad #PGFC

timelineItems.name: OptaJack
timelineItems.text: 10 - @SportingKC have not conceded more than 1 goal on the road in their last 10 regular season games. Tough. #COLvSKC

timelineItems.name: Sporting Kansas City
timelineItems.text: Now that's a #roaddron http://t.co/PtrONRzG0H

timelineItems.name: Sal Cipriano
timelineItems.text: Love, love, love that it's been all soccer all day today. @MLS from 4-past midnite! #COLvSKC should be excellent starting up now. #MLSLive

timelineItems.name: Sporting Kansas City
timelineItems.text: How did @ddwyer14 turn a loan to Orlando into two championships in a five-month span? Tune in to the #SportingKC pregame show at 4:30pm CT on @38theSpot to find out!

timelineItems.name: Kevin Preblud
timelineItems.text: #rapids #sportingkc #springfever

timelineItems.name: Steve Brisendine
timelineItems.text: @alexgoedken Someone will, eventually. But if Sporting can get results, then "Are the forwards scoring?" becomes less of a pressing issue.

timelineItems.name: Steve Brisendine
timelineItems.text: @alexgoedken Could be on a CB rotation as well, judging by recent XI decisions.

timelineItems.text: Ya juegan #COL #SKC http://t.co/mhnKb3Phgn

timelineItems.text: Ya juegan #COL #SKC http://t.co/mhnKb3Phgn

timelineItems.text: It's GAME ON in Colorado! Watch the match @38TheSpot and follow the PxP @SKCgameday #COLvSKC

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: Awesome atmosphere here with all the #SKC fans

timelineItems.name: Colorado Rapids

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Marvell Wynne (Colorado Rapids).
Graham Zusi (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Offside, Colorado Rapids. Nick LaBrocca tries a through ball, but Gabriel Torres is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Sam McDowell
timelineItems.text: Rapids center back Marvell Wynne tossed after receiving a second yellow. #SportingKC will be a man up for final five minutes.

timelineItems.name: Scott Harrington
timelineItems.text: Marvell Wynne is fast!! And he's also gone. Terrible tackle on Zusi when he was already on yellow. #COLvSKC

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: Hairston prepping to make MLS debut

timelineItems.name: Andy Edwards
timelineItems.text: Never seen a player run off the field so fast in my life as Marvell Wynne just did. #COLvSKC #SportingKC

timelineItems.name: Sporting Kansas City
timelineItems.text: Wynne sent off for a second yellow card after a late challenge on Zusi. #SportingKC will have a man advantage for the final 5+ minutes.

timelineItems.name: Steve Brisendine
timelineItems.text: Realistically, should still be 2-2 right now, subbing LaBrocca's blown sitter for the  first penalty.

timelineItems.name: Seth
timelineItems.text: Why did Wynne make that tackle? Not logical #COLvSKC

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Dominic Dwyer (Sporting Kansas City) right footed shot from the left side of the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Seth Sinovic.

timelineItems.name: Colorado Rapids
timelineItems.text: Hairston coming on for Vicente Sanchez. Hairston's first action! #COLvSKC

timelineItems.desc: Nick LaBrocca (Colorado Rapids) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Nick LaBrocca shown yellow for bad foul

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: 88' Dwyer with a great touch and turn off a Sinovic throw-in, but his right-footed attempt curls wide of the far post #COLvSKC

timelineItems.name: TNC MLS
timelineItems.text: 88' Hairston comes on for Sanchez who was looking for his hat trick #COLvSKC

timelineItems.name: Sam McDowell
timelineItems.text: Great attempt from Dwyer sails just wide. #SportingKC, Colorado still tied in the 89th minute.

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Nick LaBrocca (Colorado Rapids).
Benny Feilhaber (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Shane O'Neill (Colorado Rapids) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Dominic Dwyer (Sporting Kansas City).
Foul by Marlon Hairston (Colorado Rapids).
Benny Feilhaber (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Steve Brisendine
timelineItems.text: Five minutes of stoppage time. That's enough for what, two more penalties?

timelineItems.name: WeFollowFutbol
timelineItems.text: Know it's been said, but really happy to see that huge traveling @SportingKC crowd. Love when any club has road support. #COLvSKC

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  Colorado Rapids 2, Sporting Kansas City 3. Dominic Dwyer (Sporting Kansas City) left footed shot from the left side of the box to the high
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Dom Dwyer powers a left foot shot at the near post in stoppage time

timelineItems.name: Rapids-MileHighClub
timelineItems.text: And KC takes the lead! 3-2 on a goal by Dwyer #COLvSKC

timelineItems.name: Sporting Kansas City
timelineItems.text: GOLAZO!!! @Ddwyer14 smashes it under the crossbar and #SportingKC leads 3-2 in stoppage time!!!

timelineItems.name: Colorado Rapids
timelineItems.text: Sporting KC takes the lead on a Dwyer goal.

timelineItems.name: Steve Brisendine
timelineItems.text: Wow. That was a blast from Dwyer. Some anger in that shot.

timelineItems.name: Andy Edwards
timelineItems.text: He LASHED at that ball. Forget shooting or placing, he LASHED at it. #COLvSKC #SportingKC

timelineItems.name: RoyalsRetro
timelineItems.text: Holy crap that was awesome. Dom Dwyer is kind of a badass. #skc #mls

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Nathan Sturgis (Colorado Rapids).
Benny Feilhaber (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick on the left wing.

timelineItems.name: Luke Lohr
timelineItems.text: Dom Dwyer scores to make it 3-2 #SKC. Don't ever tell me #USLPRO isn't a good league for players to play/grow in.

timelineItems.name: Matthew Tomaszewicz
timelineItems.text: What I like about Dwyer. He shoots the ball. No hesitation.

timelineItems.name: Steve Brisendine
timelineItems.text: Rapids issue protest, claiming it's illegal to score from inside the area while the ball is still moving.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: ¡GOOOL! (90+2') | DOM DWYER anota el tercero en reposición con un remate al primer palo del arquero. #COLvSKC 2-3

timelineItems.name: Kris Kosie
timelineItems.text: I hope Marvel Wynn is using his early exit wisely & cutting orange wedges for the team #Rapids96 #SportingKC #mls #soccer #redcard

timelineItems.name: Sporting Kansas City
timelineItems.text: GAME OVER!

timelineItems.name: Pro Soccer News
timelineItems.text: FT: #ColoradoRapids 2-3 #SportingKC (Zusi, Sanchez 2, Feilhaber, Dwyer) http://t.co/OnpJ2OVVP1

timelineItems.name: Andy Edwards
timelineItems.text: #SportingKC win 3-2. Not a bad game for 800 traveling fans to witness. What a game. #COLvSKC

timelineItems.name: Laura
timelineItems.text: THREE goals. In the run of play. ONE in stoppage time. Who are these guys?! #LOVEit #SportingKC

timelineItems.name: Sporting Kansas City
timelineItems.text: GAME OVER! @Ddwyer14's stoppage-time goal gives #SportingKC a 3-2 road win over the @ColoradoRapids!

timelineItems.name: Colorado Rapids
timelineItems.text: There's the whistle. Final score COL 2 - 3 SKC. Sanchez is your Man of the Match. Head to Eighteen76 to meet him.
